title: Color Composition Task
description: Take a photo that includes the colors red, green, and purple. Make sure each color is distinctly visible.

title: Object Search Task
description: Capture a photo with at least 3 different objects: a book, a cup, and a pen.

title: Symmetry Task
description: Take a photo of an object or scene that is symmetrical (e.g., a mirror, a symmetrical building).

title: Nature Spotting Task
description: Capture a photo that contains at least one tree, one flower, and one animal.

title: Pattern Recognition Task
description: Find and photograph a repeating pattern (e.g., tiles, a brick wall, or patterned fabric).

title: Emotional Scene Task
description: Take a photo of a scene that conveys happiness (e.g., people smiling, a joyful event).

title: Shadow and Light Task
description: Capture an image that contrasts shadows and light (e.g., sunlight filtering through blinds).

title: Object by Size Task
description: Take a photo where the main object is larger than 10 cm but smaller than 1 meter (e.g., a medium-sized object like a chair or plant).

title: Texture Identification Task
description: Photograph an object with a rough texture and another with a smooth texture.

title: Scene Composition Task
description: Capture a photo of a well-balanced composition, including one large object and two small objects, all evenly spaced.

title: Time of Day Task
description: Take a photo at sunrise or sunset, showcasing the unique lighting conditions.

title: Reflection Task
description: Photograph an object and its reflection in a mirror or water surface.

title: Food Photography Task
description: Take a photo of a well-presented meal, making sure to capture the details and colors of the food.

title: Close-Up Detail Task
description: Capture a macro shot of a small object (e.g., a flower, an insect) to showcase its details.

title: Motion Blur Task
description: Take a photo of a moving object with intentional motion blur (e.g., a car, a running person).

title: Leading Lines Task
description: Photograph a scene where leading lines guide the viewer's eye through the image (e.g., roads, railways).

title: Silhouette Task
description: Capture a silhouette of an object or person against a bright background, like a sunset.

title: Depth of Field Task
description: Take a photo that demonstrates a shallow depth of field, where one object is in focus and the background is blurred.

title: Monochrome Task
description: Take a black and white photo that emphasizes contrast and texture.

title: Framing Task
description: Capture an image where the subject is framed by other objects in the scene (e.g., a person framed by a doorway).

title: Geometric Shapes Task
description: Photograph a scene that includes geometric shapes, such as circles, triangles, or squares.

title: Low Angle Task
description: Capture a photo from a low angle, looking up at the subject (e.g., a building, a person).

title: High Angle Task
description: Take a photo from a high angle, looking down on the subject (e.g., a table setup, a crowd of people).

title: Candid Photography Task
description: Capture a candid moment of people interacting naturally, without posing.

title: Night Photography Task
description: Take a photo of a scene at night, using long exposure to capture light sources like street lamps or stars.

title: Abstract Photography Task
description: Capture an abstract photo where the subject is not immediately recognizable, focusing on color, texture, or patterns.

title: Street Photography Task
description: Take a photo that captures a moment in everyday life on the street.

title: Minimalism Task
description: Photograph a simple composition with minimal objects or details, emphasizing negative space.

title: Golden Hour Task
description: Capture a photo during the golden hour (shortly after sunrise or before sunset), taking advantage of the warm light.

title: Forced Perspective Task
description: Create a photo where objects appear to be different sizes or distances due to forced perspective (e.g., making a person appear to hold a distant object).

title: Reflections in Water Task
description: Photograph reflections in a body of water, such as a lake or puddle.

title: Weather Photography Task
description: Capture an image that represents the current weather, such as rain, fog, or snow.

title: Contrasting Textures Task
description: Photograph two or more objects with distinctly different textures (e.g., rough wood next to smooth glass).

title: Architectural Detail Task
description: Capture a photo focusing on the details of a building's architecture, such as windows, doors, or ornamental designs.

title: Shadow Play Task
description: Take a photo that creatively uses shadows to enhance the image.

title: Color Contrast Task
description: Photograph a scene with high color contrast, such as complementary colors (e.g., blue and orange).

title: Repetition Task
description: Capture a scene that features repeating elements, such as a row of columns or identical objects.

title: Street Art Task
description: Photograph a piece of street art or graffiti in an urban setting.

title: Bird's Eye View Task
description: Take a photo from a bird's eye view, looking straight down on a scene.

title: In Motion Task
description: Capture an action shot of something in motion, such as a car driving by or a person running.

title: Golden Ratio Task
description: Compose a photo using the golden ratio for balanced proportions.

title: Mirroring Task
description: Photograph a scene that has a natural or artificial mirror effect, such as a lake reflecting mountains.

title: Still Life Task
description: Arrange objects on a table or surface and photograph them as a still life composition.

title: Multiple Exposure Task
description: Take a photo that blends multiple exposures, either digitally or in-camera, to create a layered effect.

title: Color Blocking Task
description: Photograph a scene where large blocks of color dominate the composition.

title: Close-Up Nature Task
description: Take a close-up photo of a plant, flower, or natural object, highlighting the details.

title: Reflections in Glass Task
description: Capture reflections in glass surfaces, such as windows or mirrors, to create interesting visual effects.

title: Portrait with Background Story Task
description: Photograph a person in a way that the background adds context to their story or situation.

title: Movement in Water Task
description: Capture the movement of water, such as waves or a waterfall, using a slow shutter speed.

title: Backlight Task
description: Photograph a subject with strong backlighting, such as the sun behind a person or object.

title: Warm vs Cool Colors Task
description: Capture a photo that contrasts warm and cool colors in the same frame (e.g., warm orange and cool blue).

title: Unique Perspective Task
description: Take a photo from an unusual or creative angle that changes the viewer's perspective on the subject.

title: Window Light Task
description: Photograph a subject using only the natural light coming from a window.

title: Dual Focus Task
description: Capture a photo where two subjects are in focus, one in the foreground and one in the background, using a large depth of field.

title: Golden Hour Portrait Task
description: Take a portrait during the golden hour, capturing the subject with warm, soft lighting.

title: Reflections in Puddles Task
description: Capture an image that uses puddles to reflect an object or scene, creating an interesting visual effect.

title: High Contrast Task
description: Photograph a scene that has a strong contrast between light and dark areas, such as shadows on a wall.

title: Silhouette Portrait Task
description: Photograph a person as a silhouette against a bright background, such as the sky during sunset.

title: Frame Within a Frame Task
description: Take a photo where the subject is framed by another element in the scene, like a window, doorway, or archway.

title: Reflection Selfie Task
description: Capture a self-portrait using reflections from glass, mirrors, or water.

title: Texture Play Task
description: Photograph an object or scene where different textures create an interesting contrast.

title: Dynamic Movement Task
description: Capture an image that conveys a sense of dynamic movement, such as dancers, runners, or water in motion.

title: Natural Framing Task
description: Use elements of nature, such as tree branches or flowers, to frame your subject in the photo.

title: Close-Up of Everyday Object Task
description: Take a close-up photo of an everyday object, such as a key, pen, or cup, to reveal details often overlooked.

title: Color Harmony Task
description: Capture a photo that uses harmonious colors, such as shades of the same color family or complementary colors.

title: Diagonal Lines Task
description: Photograph a scene where diagonal lines lead the viewer’s eye through the composition.

title: Shape Contrast Task
description: Capture an image that contrasts different shapes, such as circular objects against rectangular backgrounds.

title: Low Light Photography Task
description: Take a photo in low light conditions, using available light sources like candles or street lamps.

title: Reflections in Sunglasses Task
description: Capture a reflection in someone’s sunglasses, showing a different perspective of the surrounding scene.

title: Soft Focus Task
description: Create an image with a soft focus effect, where the subject is slightly blurred for a dreamy look.

title: Street Vendor Task
description: Photograph a street vendor in action, capturing the details of their work and environment.

title: Portrait with Motion Task
description: Take a portrait that includes motion blur, such as a person moving their hair or clothes in the wind.

title: Sunburst Task
description: Capture a photo that includes a sunburst effect, where sunlight shines through gaps in objects like trees or buildings.

title: Contrasting Shadows Task
description: Photograph a scene that emphasizes the contrast between light and shadows, such as the shadow of a tree on a wall.

title: Monochromatic Color Task
description: Take a photo where the entire composition is dominated by different shades of the same color.

title: Birds in Flight Task
description: Capture a photo of birds in flight, freezing the motion of their wings in mid-air.

title: Underground Scene Task
description: Photograph an underground or low-light environment, such as a subway station, capturing the mood and atmosphere.

title: Dynamic Architecture Task
description: Take a photo of modern or dynamic architecture, focusing on sharp angles, curves, and lines.

title: Reflection in Metal Task
description: Photograph reflections in a metal surface, such as a shiny car or sculpture.

title: Warm Light Task
description: Capture a scene bathed in warm light, such as late afternoon sunlight or candlelight.

title: Splash of Water Task
description: Photograph water splashing or droplets in motion, such as a glass being filled or water falling from a fountain.

title: Opposing Directions Task
description: Capture a photo where subjects are moving in opposing directions, such as two people walking away from each other.

title: Emphasizing Lines Task
description: Photograph a scene where lines dominate the composition, such as the lines of a bridge or road.

title: Dramatic Sky Task
description: Capture a photo of a dramatic sky, emphasizing clouds, sunset colors, or storms.

title: Water Reflection Portrait Task
description: Photograph a person whose reflection is visible in a body of water, such as a pond or lake.

title: Dual Exposure Effect Task
description: Create a photo that mimics a dual exposure effect, blending two images together either in-camera or digitally.

title: Texture in Nature Task
description: Capture a close-up of natural textures, such as tree bark, leaves, or rocks.

title: Unusual Shadow Task
description: Take a photo that features an unusual or unexpected shadow, such as a shadow cast by an object with a unique shape.

title: Overexposure Task
description: Intentionally overexpose your photo to create a bright, washed-out effect for artistic purposes.

title: Long Exposure Light Trails Task
description: Capture light trails from moving cars or other sources using a long exposure.

title: Cityscape at Night Task
description: Photograph a cityscape at night, highlighting the lights and architecture of the urban environment.

title: Fire or Candlelight Task
description: Capture an image of fire or candlelight, emphasizing the movement and warm glow of the flames.

title: Mirrored Symmetry Task
description: Photograph a scene that has perfect mirrored symmetry, either naturally or through a reflection.

title: Person and Architecture Task
description: Photograph a person interacting with architecture, using the buildings as a background or framing element.

title: Reflective Surface Task
description: Capture an image where reflective surfaces, such as a mirror or glass, create a doubling effect of the subject.

title: Contrasting Elements Task
description: Photograph a scene where two contrasting elements are side by side, such as old and new buildings.

title: Golden Ratio Portrait Task
description: Compose a portrait using the golden ratio to guide the placement of the subject and background elements.

title: Neon Light Task
description: Capture an image of neon lights at night, focusing on the vibrant colors and glow.

title: Reflection in Eyes Task
description: Photograph a close-up portrait where the reflection of the surroundings is visible in the subject's eyes.

title: Natural Leading Lines Task
description: Capture an image where natural elements, like rivers or tree branches, lead the viewer's eye through the composition.

title: Opposing Colors Task
description: Take a photo that highlights two opposing colors, such as blue and orange, or red and green.

title: Selective Color Task
description: Create an image where most of the scene is black and white, but one color stands out vividly.

title: Reflections in Water Droplets Task
description: Photograph tiny water droplets that reflect the surrounding scene, such as on leaves or glass.

title: Contrasting Moods Task
description: Capture a photo that conveys two contrasting moods, such as happiness and sadness, in the same frame.

title: Dynamic Duo Task
description: Take a photo of two objects or people that complement each other in an interesting way.

title: Street Lights and Shadows Task
description: Capture the interplay between street lights and shadows, creating a dramatic urban scene at night.

title: Symmetrical Buildings Task
description: Photograph a building that has perfect symmetry, focusing on its architectural balance.

title: Vibrant Urban Graffiti Task
description: Capture vibrant urban graffiti that uses bold colors and intricate designs to convey artistic expression.

title: Perspective Shift Task
description: Photograph a common object from an unusual angle, making it look abstract or unrecognizable.

title: Contrasting Textures Task
description: Take a photo that highlights contrasting textures, such as rough stone against smooth glass.

title: Motion Blur with Stillness Task
description: Capture an image where one element is moving (creating motion blur) while another element remains still and sharp.

title: Colorful Street Markets Task
description: Photograph a colorful street market, focusing on the vibrant colors of the goods being sold.

title: Backlit Silhouette Task
description: Capture a backlit silhouette of a person or object, where the light source is directly behind the subject.

title: Play of Shadows Task
description: Take a photo that plays with shadows and light to create interesting shapes and patterns.

title: Hidden Faces Task
description: Photograph a scene that includes hidden or abstract faces, where the features are suggested by objects.

title: Night Sky Stars Task
description: Capture the night sky filled with stars, using long exposure to reveal the depth of the universe.

title: Portrait with Glass Reflections Task
description: Take a portrait where the subject is partially obscured by glass reflections, adding complexity to the image.

title: Colorful Sunset Reflection Task
description: Photograph a colorful sunset reflected on water or glass, creating a mirrored version of the scene.

title: Wide Angle Landscape Task
description: Capture a vast landscape using a wide-angle lens, emphasizing the expansiveness of the scene.

title: Minimalist Object Task
description: Take a photo of a single object against a simple, uncluttered background, embracing minimalism.

title: Texture in Architecture Task
description: Photograph the texture of an architectural surface, such as brick, stone, or metal.

title: Movement and Stillness Task
description: Capture a scene where there is both movement and stillness, such as a moving car with still pedestrians.

title: Geometric Patterns Task
description: Take a photo of repeating geometric patterns, such as tiles, windows, or stairs.

title: Portrait with Dramatic Lighting Task
description: Capture a portrait using dramatic, directional lighting that emphasizes the contours of the face.

title: Vintage Filter Task
description: Take a photo that looks vintage or retro, using filters or editing to replicate an old-fashioned style.

title: Color Pop Task
description: Photograph a scene where one color stands out against a muted or monochrome background.

title: Backlit Plant Life Task
description: Capture a plant or leaf with backlighting, highlighting its delicate structure and veins.

title: Blurry Bokeh Lights Task
description: Photograph blurry bokeh lights in the background, creating a dreamy, out-of-focus effect.

title: Stormy Weather Task
description: Take a dramatic photo of stormy weather, such as dark clouds, rain, or lightning in the distance.

title: Reflection in a Puddle Task
description: Capture an interesting scene reflected in a puddle of water, turning the ordinary into the extraordinary.

title: Hands in Action Task
description: Photograph hands engaged in an action, such as playing an instrument, cooking, or creating art.

title: Foggy Morning Scene Task
description: Capture a foggy morning scene, emphasizing the misty, ethereal atmosphere.

title: Contrasting Lights Task
description: Photograph a scene that contrasts warm and cool light sources, creating a dynamic interplay of colors.

title: Long Shadows Task
description: Capture long shadows cast by the setting or rising sun, adding depth and interest to the composition.

title: Negative Space Task
description: Use negative space effectively in a photo, leaving much of the composition empty to emphasize the subject.

title: Reflections in Store Windows Task
description: Capture reflections in a store window, blending the outside world with what's on display inside.

title: Architecture and Nature Task
description: Photograph the contrast between architecture and nature, such as a building surrounded by trees.

title: Overexposed Portrait Task
description: Intentionally overexpose a portrait to create a bright, washed-out effect that focuses on the subject’s expression.

title: Tiny World Task
description: Create a tiny world effect by photographing miniature objects as if they were life-sized.

title: Street Art Close-Up Task
description: Capture a close-up of street art, emphasizing the details and textures of the paint or medium used.

title: Dramatic Sunset Silhouette Task
description: Photograph a dramatic sunset silhouette, where the subject is dark against a colorful, glowing sky.

title: Playful Reflection Task
description: Take a playful photo where reflections distort reality, creating a fun or surreal effect.

title: Colorful Urban Mural Task
description: Photograph a colorful mural in an urban environment, focusing on its artistic expression.

title: People in Motion Task
description: Capture people in motion, such as walking, running, or dancing, with a sense of movement in the photo.

title: Harsh Light Shadows Task
description: Use harsh light to create strong shadows and high contrast in a photo, emphasizing shapes and lines.

title: Bicycle in the Rain Task
description: Photograph a bicycle in the rain, with droplets or reflections adding interest to the scene.

title: Abstract Architecture Task
description: Take an abstract photo of architecture, focusing on patterns, lines, and unusual angles.

title: Close-Up of Insect Task
description: Capture a close-up photo of an insect, emphasizing its details, such as wings, legs, and eyes.

title: Colorful Balloons Task
description: Photograph colorful balloons against a contrasting background, emphasizing their brightness and vibrancy.

title: Overlapping Objects Task
description: Capture a scene where objects overlap, creating an interesting composition of shapes and colors.

title: Busy City Street Task
description: Photograph a busy city street, capturing the hustle and bustle of people, vehicles, and activity.

title: Contrasting Colors in Nature Task
description: Capture contrasting colors in nature, such as a bright flower against a green backdrop.

title: Reflections in a Car Window Task
description: Photograph reflections in a car window, showing both the interior and the world outside.

title: Close-Up of a Flower Task
description: Capture a close-up of a flower, focusing on its petals, colors, and intricate details.

title: Dramatic Black and White Task
description: Create a dramatic black-and-white photo that emphasizes contrast, light, and shadow.
